snippet.title: Hell is Us | Developer Update: Creating the World
snippet.description:
Learn more: https://hell-is-us.com/

Jonathan Jacques-Belletête, Hell is Us' Creative Director revealed the creative process of the game, its themes and guidelines.

Hell is Us is a 3rd-person action-adventure game that combines intense melee combat with the thrill of exploration. Explore a semi-open world to find answers to your questions and face mysterious creatures all along your journey.

#HELLisUS will be available on PlayStation 5, Xbox Series and PC in 2023.
-------------------------------
For news about our other games and products, you can also follow us on:
